database.description: The name of the database. Required when authenticating using temporary credentials.

dbUser.description: The database user name. Required when authenticating using temporary credentials.

secretManagerArn.description: The name or ARN of the secret that enables access to the database. Required when authenticating using Secrets Manager.

sqls.description: List of SQL statements text to run, each of maximum length of 100,000.

statementName.description: The name of the SQL statement. You can name the SQL statement when you create it to identify the query.

withEvent.description: Indicates whether to send an event back to EventBridge after the SQL statement runs.
